verbose_text: The active form of ASK1 (p-ASK1) functions as a signaling node for several MAPK kinases, resulting in activation of p38MAPK and c-Jun N-terminal kinase (JNK), and regulation of cell survival and death.
evidence: ASK1 (p-ASK1) functions as a signaling node for several MAPK kinases, resulting in activation of p38MAPK
